title: Drip Coffee Maker
ai_context_notes: This is a standard 12-cup drip coffee maker. Focus on the core steps of adding water, a filter, coffee grounds, and starting the brew cycle.

buttons.name: Power/Brew
buttons.function: Toggles the machine on or off and starts the brewing process.

buttons.name: Carafe
buttons.function: The glass pot that holds the brewed coffee.

steps.title: Add Water
steps.description: Open the lid on top of the coffee maker. Pour cold, fresh water into the reservoir up to the desired cup line.

steps.title: Insert Filter and Coffee
steps.description: Place a paper filter into the brew basket. Add one tablespoon of coffee grounds per cup of water.

steps.title: Start Brewing
steps.description: Place the carafe on the warming plate and press the Power (‚èª) button. The indicator light will turn on and brewing will begin.

steps.title: Serve Coffee
steps.description: Once the brewing is complete and the machine is quiet, carefully remove the carafe and pour your coffee.
